    ImgHelpR-vignette

Rotate an image 90, 180, 270, or 360 degrees counterclockwise.

Source: R/ImgRotate.r
ImgRotate.Rd

Rotate an image 90, 180, 270, or 360 degrees counterclockwise.

Usage

ImgRotate(img, degree)

Arguments

img,

path of the input image

degree,

desired degree to rotate img: 90, 180, 270, 360.

Value

rotated_img

Examples

img <- array(runif(1000),dim=c(10,10,3))
ImgRotate(img, 270)
